mapper.insert:
insert into task_script_config
task_script_config.task_config_main_id,
task_script_config.file,
task_script_config.version,
task_script_config.create_time
values
#{taskConfigMainId},
#{file},
#{version},
#{createTime}
mapper.select:
select task_script_config.id, task_script_config.task_config_main_id, task_script_config.file, task_script_config.version, task_script_config.create_time form task_script_config
task_script_config.id = #{id}
